Note: Signed "Mauzan." Date based on dates of 1st World War. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text in Italian says Loan for the Liberation. Illustration shows a womens figure with wings, symbolic of liberation. About ten hands are reaching to touch the sword she is carrying.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I

Title: Prestito della Liberazione
